wikipedia_page.main: Winifred Lydia Caunden Sargent (8 May 1905 – October 1979) was an English mathematician. She studied at Newnham College, Cambridge and carried out research into Lebesgue integration, fractional integration and differentiation and the properties of BK-spaces.

response: * Winifred Sargent (1905–1979), English researcher on integration theory and BK-spaces
